lines: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdor 'dzin zung 'brel gyi
gsang gsum yon tan mtha' dag gcig bsdus pa
dad ldan sems nyid a dar+sha yi ngor
dur smrig 'dzin par shar ba de la 'dud
blo gros zab mos gzhung bzang don
mchog tu ji bzhin gzigs pa yis
don gnyis lhun grub sems dpa' che
bla ma de la gus btud nas
blo bzang rnam rig bang mdzod sgo lcags kha
mkhas rmongs sus kyang bde blag 'byed nus pa'i
rmad byung mchan 'grel gser gyi lde mig 'di
kho bos bcad brdar bsregs pa'i blo yis bskrun
'dir 'bad legs byas 'o ma'i mdangs 'dzin des
dri med rnam dpyod pir gyis legs bris pa'i
mtha' yas rig gnas gya gyu'i ri mo yis
snying gi me long ngos kun khyab gyur cig
bka' drin mtshungs med rje btsun bla ma la
'gyur ldog med pa'i dad pa skye ba dang
tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i grogs dag la
phyogs zhen med pa'i dag snang skye bar shog
yid dang kun gzhis 'grel ba 'di
a ba ga yi wang shog gi
dge slong dpal dan rgya mtsho yis
chos sde sku 'bum byams gling du
mthun rkyen sbyar te par du bsgrubs
dge 'dis ma rgan 'gro ba rnams
dka' ba'i don la nges rnyed nas
sa lam bgrod pa mthar phyin shog
oM ma Ni pad me hUM
oM AHra pa tsa na d+hI
oM badzra pA ni hUM phaT
